SummaryEnglish: Prosecutor Komazuki Nao from the Yokohama District Public Prosecutors Office’s Minato Mirai branch and lawyer Tsutaya Madoka from the law firm Yokohama Gold dated for seven years since the time they were in school. Even after they broke up, they have continued to be hopelessly linked to each other.

1.SummaryEnglish:
脚本家・坂元裕二の最新作　阿部サダヲ＆松たか子　超豪華タッグが実現！
リーガルサスペンス×ラブストーリー
元恋人同士の“検事”と“弁護士”が繰り広げる圧巻の饒舌バトル!!
